data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Marc: Hi, June! Are ____ coming ____ Danny's ____ party ____ weekend?
June: I'm ____ sure ____. Will ____ of ____ friends ____ there?
Marc: Yes - everybody ____ the ____ building ____ be ____. If ____ come, I'm ____ that ____ will ____ happy ____ see ____. You should come, don't you think?
data.partBlankContent:
Marc: Hi, June! Are y__ coming t_ Danny's din___ party th__ weekend?
June: I'm n__ sure y__. Will ma__ of o__ friends b_ there?
Marc: Yes - everybody fr__ the apar_____ building wi__ be th___. If y__ come, I'm su__ that ever____ will b_ happy t_ see y__. You should come, don't you think?
data.answer:
马克:嗨,琼!这周末你来参加丹尼的晚宴吗?
June:我还不确定。会有很多老朋友来吗?
马克:是的，公寓楼里的所有人都会去。如果你来，我相信每个人见到你都会很高兴的。你应该来，不是吗?
